creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo appliques in scroll and butterfly patterns on extremely soiled white backgrounds embroidered on black background with bright pink; bordered in very fine running cross stitch pattern; lined in commercial green floral print; keyhole neck with one tie with loop; loop on PR border
